title: Google replace my pixel 4 XL 128gb covered under the 1-year warranty. Replacement IMEI says 64gb but
content: My phone replacement from Google has 128 GB in it but the IMEI number says it only has 64 gigabytes. My phone was replaced under warranty for hardware and software issue. How do I fix this problem I want to trade in my device but imei number says I only have 64 gigabytes... But the replacement device is 128 GB. What should I do to correct this problem?
